enemyTemplates.Name: Shadow Reaver
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Shadow Reaver vanishes briefly, striking from the shadows for critical damage.

enemyTemplates.Name: Crystal Golem
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Crystal Golem radiates a blinding light, stunning its enemy.

enemyTemplates.Name: Ethereal Assassin
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: Ethereal Assassin phases through reality, delivering a deadly strike from nowhere.

enemyTemplates.Name: Necrotic Mage
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Necrotic Mage summons undead minions to attack its foe.

enemyTemplates.Name: Feral Spirit
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Feral Spirit howls, calling forth a pack of spectral wolves to assail the enemy.
